Camel Case

Camel case a string.

Installation

Node

npm install camel-case --save

Usage

var camelCase = require('camel-case');

camelCase('string');         //=> "string"
camelCase('dot.case');       //=> "dotCase"
camelCase('PascalCase');     //=> "pascalCase"
camelCase('version 1.2.10'); //=> "version1_2_10"
